drupalNodeEvent.title: China Now Music Festivel: China and Beethoven, "Building Bridges Through Music: Beethoven in Beijing"

field_speakers.processed: Ambassador Nicholas Platt, Sheila Melvin (Stanford), Ryan Fleur (Philadelphia Orchestra, filmmaker Jennifer Lin, Jindong Cai (Bard College), Rachel Cooper (Asia Society)

field_organizers.processed: Asia Society Northern California, US-China Music Institute of the Bard College Conservatory of Music

field_description.processed: Hosted by Asia Society of Northern California and moderated by author Sheila Melvin, this discussion with the filmmakers Jennifer Lin and Jindong Cai, plus guests Ryan Fleur, executive director of the Philadelphia Orchestra, and Ambassador Nicholas Platt, will look at the future of culture and diplomacy through classical music.
